## ماهي الدالة (function)?



```{r}
df <- tibble(
  a = rnorm(10),
  b = rnorm(10),
  c = rnorm(10),
  d = rnorm(10)
)

df$a <- ( df$a - mean(df$a))
df$b <- ( df$b - mean(df$b))
df$c <- ( df$c - mean(df$c))
df$d <- ( df$d - mean(df$d))

remove_mean <- function(x) {
    x - mean(x)
}

df$a <- remove_mean( df$a )
df$b <- remove_mean( df$b )
df$c <- remove_mean( df$c )
df$d <- remove_mean( df$d )

```


`r chunk_reveal("others_diamonds_bar", title =

```{r others_diamonds_bar, include = FALSE}
diamonds %>%
```

.pull-left[
```{r}
library(patchwork)
p1<-diamonds %>% 
  ggplot(aes(y = price, x = carat)) +
  geom_jitter() +
  scale_x_log10() +
  scale_y_log10() 

p2<-diamonds %>% 
  ggplot(aes(y = price, x = cut)) +
  geom_boxplot() +
  scale_y_log10() 
 
p3<-diamonds %>% 
  ggplot(aes(y = carat, x = cut)) +
  geom_boxplot() +
  scale_y_log10() 

p4<- diamonds %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x = log10(carat), y = log10(price), color = cut)) +
  geom_jitter(alpha = .2) +
  geom_smooth()
```

### الرحلات الواصلة الى IAH او HOU
")`

```{r filter_2, include = FALSE, error=TRUE}

flights %>% 
  filter(dest == "IAH" | dest == "HOU") %>% #ROTATE
  filter(dest == "IAH" & dest == "HOU") %>% #ROTATE
  filter(dest == "IAH", dest == "HOU") %>% #ROTATE
  filter(dest %in% c("IAH", "HOU")) %>% #ROTATE
  print()

```

---

```{r, eval=FALSE}

flights %>%
  filter(dest == "IAH" | dest == "HOU")  #Correct
```

```{r summarise_2, include=FALSE}
  group_by(carrier) %>% 
  summarise(n = n(), 
            avg_time = mean(air_time, na.rm = TRUE), #BREAK3
            max_time = max(air_time, na.rm = TRUE), #BREAK4
            min_time = min(air_time, na.rm = TRUE)  #BREAK5
            ) %>% 
  arrange(desc(n))
  
```

### المفتتاح الرئيسي Primary Key

العمود المستخدم لربط جدولين يطلق علية المفتاح.

المفتاح قد يكون عمود او اكثر من عمود تستطيع من خلالها تميز كل صف من جدول البيانات. مثال على ذالك رقم الموظف.
حيث يجب ان يحمل كل موظف رثم مميز لة.

في جميع الحالات السابقة كان المفتاح الرئيسي هو العمود 
`id`

## البيانات المفقودة

---

class: inverse, center, middle

.my-ltr[

> "Imputing one value for a missing datum cannot be correct in general, because we don’t know what value to impute with certainty (if we did, it wouldn’t be missing)." - Donald B. Rubin
]

---


انواع البيانات المفقودة

.my-ltr[
* Missing completely at random (MCAR): If the probability of being missing is the same for all cases, then the data are said to be missing completely at random (MCAR is often unrealistic for the data at hand)

* Missing at random (MAR): If the probability of being missing is the same only within groups defined by the observed data (Most common)

* Not missing at random (Systematic): 

* Explicitly missing: flagged with NA 

* Implicitly: Simply not present in the data.
]
